title: ICE

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: S-has-mcve
labels.description: A Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example has been found for this issue

body:
### Code ```rust pub struct Color(pub T); pub struct Cell { foreground: Color, background: Color, } pub trait Over { fn over(self, bottom: Bottom) -> Output; } // Cell: Over impl Over, Cell> for Cell where Fg: Over, Bg: Over, { fn over(self, _: Color) -> Cell { todo!(); } } // Cell: Over impl Over, Cell> for Cell where Self: Over, Cell>, { fn over(self, bottom: Cell) -> Cell { self.over(bottom.background); todo!(); } } // Cell: Over<&mut Cell, ()> impl<'b, TopFg, TopBg, BottomFg, BottomBg> Over<&'b mut Cell, ()> for Cell where Cell: Over, Cell>, { fn over(self, _: &'b mut Cell) { todo!(); } } // &Cell: Over<&mut Cell, ()> impl<'t, 'b, TopFg, TopBg, BottomFg, BottomBg> Over<&'b mut Cell, ()> for &'t Cell where Cell: Over, Cell>, { fn over(self, _: &'b mut Cell) { todo!(); } } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.53.0-nightly (42816d61e 2021-04-24) binary: rustc commit-hash: 42816d61ead7e46d462df997958ccfd514f8c21c commit-date: 2021-04-24 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.53.0-nightly LLVM version: 12.0.0 ``` Same in 1.52.0-nightly, same in 1.51.0. ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_trait_selection/src/traits/select/confirmation.rs:201:17: Where clause `Binder( as style::Over, style::cell::Cell>>, [])` was applicable to `Obligation(predicate=Binder(TraitPredicate( as style::Over, style::cell::Cell<_, _>>>), []), depth=2)` but now is not thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/42816d61ead7e46d462df997958ccfd514f8c21c/library/std/src/panic.rs:59:5 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.53.0-nightly (42816d61e 2021-04-24) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [evaluate_obligation] evaluating trait selection obligation `style::cell::Cell: style::Over<^1_0, ^1_1>` #1 [typeck] type-checking `style::cell::::over` end of query stack error: aborting due to previous error error: could not compile `tender` To learn more, run the command again with --verbose. ``` `RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo build`:
Backtrace

Good luck! <3
